name: Leave me Alone (itch) (Eternal Dream Studio)
description:
How to Play use A & D = move X = go to your Imagined World You will play as a lonely teenager who wants to buy bread in the cafeteria? Please press A or D if you are stuck in a black screen :D

Note: because this game is for a game jam and we only have so little time to make and polish this many features that we can't include like:

-> we intended to make this is an action game where you can shoot and defeat the enemy
-> we also want to deliver a simple story in this game but we can't so far (maybe in the next update we gonna add something story-related stuff)
-> some visual effect that we can't deliver
